instanceConfig.assignPublicIPHelper: Assign a public IP to the DB servers for connections over the internet.
instanceConfig.enableClientToNodeTLSHelper: Enable encryption in transit for communication between clients and the DB servers.
instanceConfig.enableEncryptionAtRestHelper: Enable encryption for data stored on the tablet servers.
instanceConfig.enableNodeToNodeTLSHelper: Enable encryption in transit for communication between the DB servers.
instanceConfig.enableYEDISHelper: Enable the YEDIS API endpoint to run REDIS compatible workloads.
instanceConfig.enableYSQLHelper: Enable the YSQL API endpoint to run postgres compatible workloads.
instanceConfig.enableYCQLHelper: Enable the YCQL API endpoint to run cassandra compatible workloads.
instanceConfig.title: Instance Configuration
instanceConfig.useTimeSyncHelper: Enable the {{provider}} Time Sync functionality for the DB servers.
